op-dbus-compact.description: Compact op-dbus MCP with meta-tools - NOTE: Claude Desktop prefers stdio. Use op-mcp-server binary for native support.

op-dbus-stdio.description: op-dbus MCP via stdio (recommended for Claude Desktop)

_note: Claude Desktop natively supports stdio-based MCP servers. For SSE-based servers, you may need mcp-proxy or similar bridge. The op-mcp-server binary provides native stdio support.
